title: cheezcarls
author: cheezcarls
content: Source: https://cryptopotato.com/ripple-xrp-airdrop-incoming-at-this-cryptocurrency-exchange-but-theres-a-catch/If you have been an Uphold user and was trading/holding XRP for quite sometime, there is an upcoming airdrop for the users.However, I have noticed that only US customers of Uphold are qualified for this airdrop which means the rest of the countries are not eligible. After Uphold teamed up with Ripple Labs, they have increased their total airdrop allocation from 10,000 to 20,000 XRP. It was known that Uphold did not abandoned and removed XRP from the list of their supported cryptocurrencies during the Ripple’s 3-year legal battle with the US SEC.And it was all paid off due to their recent victory over SEC which is why they have forged a strong partnership recently. What are your thoughts and reactions about this one guys? Would love to hear it from the community. Thanks!
